original_text: So the people of Gad and the people of Reuben came and said to Moses and to Eleazar the priest and to the chiefs of the congregation,
korean_text: 갓 자손과 르우벤 자손이 와서 모세와 제사장 엘르아살과 회중 지휘관들에게 말하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: So the people of Gad and the people of Reuben came
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 갓 지파와 르우벤 지파 사람들이 와서

sentences.original_text: and said to Moses and to Eleazar the priest
and to the chiefs of the congregation,
